name: Power Up (ScreamingGoatStudios)
description:
Power Up is a small top down shooter made for the Geo Jam 2022 hosted by Icoso. The theme was "Pick a Side".

Every two rounds you will receive a choice of two different power ups and you will have to choose which one you want. Try and kill as many enemies as you can and see how many round you can beat before dying! 

Controls:

WASD - Move

LMB - Shoot
